title: [Get Started with StorageHub SDK](/store-and-retrieve-data/use-storagehub-sdk/get-started/)
content: Set up your development environment, install the StorageHub SDK, and prepare your project to start interacting with the DataHaven network.

title: [Create a Bucket](/store-and-retrieve-data/use-storagehub-sdk/create-a-bucket/)
content: Connect your wallet or app identity, select a Main Storage Provider (MSP), and create or reuse a bucket.

title: [Authenticate with SIWE and JWT](/store-and-retrieve-data/use-storagehub-sdk/authenticate-with-siwe-and-jwt/)
content: Use Sign-In with Ethereum (SIWE) and JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for secure authentication.

title: [Upload a File](/store-and-retrieve-data/use-storagehub-sdk/upload-a-file/)
content: Issue a Storage Request, verify it, then upload a file to the connected MSP. Includes steps to verify upload success.

title: [Retrieve Your Data](/store-and-retrieve-data/use-storagehub-sdk/retrieve-your-data/)
content: Use your file key to download your file from the MSP client and save it programmatically.
